pageContent:
1. https://tiktoknew-dot-loreal-tiktok-navigator.uc.r.appspot.com/accounts 包含以下信息：
Account Name:L'Oréal TikTok account name
Account Id:L'Oréal TikTok user name
Account Avatar Image:L'Oréal TikTok account picture
Account Country or Region:The country or region of L'Oréal TikTok account
Account Total # of Video:Counts of the video posted under L'Oréal TikTok account
Account Total # of Live Streaming:Counts of the livestream finished under L'Oréal TikTok account
Account Total GMV:Total gross margin value for L'Oréal TikTok account
Account # of Follower:Number of followers of L'Oréal TikTok account
Account # of Profile Visited:Number of visits on L'Oreal brand account profile page
Account Total Ads Spending:Media spending amount on L'Oréal TikTok account
Account ROAS:Return on Advertising Spend for L'Oréal TikTok account
Account CTR:Average CTR for all ads videos
Account Total # of Orders:Counts of sales orders created on TikTok shop
Account Total # of Paid Orders:Counts of sales orders paid on TikTok shop
Account Total # of Unit Sold:Counts of product sold on TikTok shop
Account Total # of Views:Counts of total views of brand video
Product name:Name of SKU/product sold on brand account, can be sourced by livestream and video
# of Unit:Counts of product sold on brand account, can be sourced by livestream and video
# of buyer:Counts of unique users on brand account, can be sourced by livestream and video
# of orders:Counts of orders on brand account, can be sourced by livestream and video
Revenue:Total gross margin value on brand account, can be sourced by livestream and video
Revenue contribution:Revenue contribution on brand account, can be sourced by livestream and video
Account Name:Affiliate TikTok account name
Account Id:Affiliate TikTok user name
Account Avatar Image:Affiliate TikTok account picture
Account Country or Region:Affiliate TikTok account country or region
Account Total # of Video:Counts of the video posted under affiliate TikTok account
Account Total # of Live Streaming:Counts of the livestream finished under affiliate TikTok account
Account Total GMV:Total gross margin value for affiliate TikTok account
Account Total GMV_video:Total gross margin value for affiliate TikTok account, driven by video
Account Total GMV_LS:Total gross margin value for affiliate TikTok account, driven by livestream
2.https://tiktoknew-dot-loreal-tiktok-navigator.uc.r.appspot.com/market 包含以下信息：
Account # of Follower:Number of followers of affiliate account
Account Total # of Unit Sold:Counts of product units sold on TikTok shop
Account Total # of Views:Counts of total views of affiliate video
Avg. engagement rate_video:Avg. engagement rate of affiliate video
ACU(Average Concurrent Users):The average viewers per live
Total viewers_LS:The total number of viewers of all livestreams
Avg. live duration:Average livestream duration
Partnered brand:Brand name that this affiliate used to partner before, including both LRL brands and competitor brand
Account Name:Competitor TikTok account name
Account Id:Competitor TikTok user name
Account Avatar Image:Competitor TikTok account picture
Account Country or Region:Competitor TikTok account country or region
Account industry:Competitor's industry
Account Total # of Video:Counts of the video posted under competitor TikTok account
Account Total # of Live Streaming:Counts of the livestream finished under competitor TikTok account
Account Total GMV:Total gross margin value for competitor TikTok account
Account Total GMV_video:Total gross margin value for competitor TikTok account, driven by branded video
Account Total GMV_LS:Total gross margin value for competitor TikTok account, driven by branded livestream
Account # of Follower:Number of followers of competitor account
Account Total # of Unit Sold:Counts of product units sold on TikTok shop
Account Total # of Views:Counts of total views of competitor video
Account Total # of Like:Counts of total likes of competitor video
Account Total # of Share:Counts of total Shares of competitor video
Account Total # of Comment:Counts of total Comments of competitor video
Avg. engagement rate_video:Avg. engagement rate of competitor video
Avg. engagement rate_LS:Avg. engagement rate of competitor LS
Avg. viewer_LS:The average number of viewers of all livestreams
Total Hours of Livestream:Total Hours of Livestream
Total viewer_LS:The total number of viewers of all livestreams
GMV_per LS:Revenue of top performing competitor livestream
Duration_per LS:Live duration of top performing competitor livestream
Viewers_per LS:# of Viewers of top performing competitor livestream
Video description_per video:Video description of top performing competitor video
Length_per video:Video length of top performing competitor video
Views_per video:Video views of top performing competitor video
Engagement rate_per video:Video engagement rate of top performing competitor video
Likes_per video:Video likes of top performing competitor video
Shares_per video:Video shares of top performing competitor video
